Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/72nd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Ashland
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to a mechanical problem on the train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
